message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $200. I think you'll find it's a great deal for its quality.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120
Thanks for your interest, Bob.  I understand your budget, but I can't go lower than $180.  This product is truly top-notch, and I'm confident you'd be getting great value.
I'm still interested, but I think $180 is a bit steep. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so how about $140?
